mapper.select: /* 상품 목록 리스트 조회 */ SELECT g.goods_code , g.goods_name , g.user_id , g.goods_rental_availability , g.goods_value_price , g.goods_day_price , g.goods_reg_date , g.goods_detail , gc.goods_category_name FROM tb_goods AS g JOIN tb_goods_category AS gc ON g.goods_category_code = gc.goods_category_code;

/* 상품 목록 리스트 조회 */ SELECT g.goods_code , g.goods_name , g.user_id , g.goods_rental_availability , g.goods_value_price , g.goods_day_price , g.goods_reg_date , g.goods_detail , gc.goods_category_name FROM tb_goods AS g JOIN tb_goods_category AS gc ON g.goods_category_code = gc.goods_category_code WHERE g.user_id NOT IN ( SELECT b.blocked_user_id FROM tb_block AS b WHERE b.blocking_user_id = #{loginId});
SELECT gi.goods_img_code ,gi.goods_img ,row_number() OVER() FROM tb_goods AS g JOIN tb_goods_img AS gi ON g.goods_code = gi.goods_code WHERE g.goods_code = #{goodsCode};

SELECT g.goods_code ,g.goods_name ,g.goods_category_code ,g.user_id ,g.goods_rental_availability ,g.goods_value_price ,g.goods_purchase_date ,g.goods_day_price ,g.goods_detail ,gc.goods_category_name FROM tb_goods AS g JOIN tb_goods_category AS gc ON g.goods_category_code = gc.goods_category_code WHERE g.goods_code = #{goodsCode};
